commit.message:
Auto merge of #31903 - mitaa:rdoc-ghostly-impls, r=alexcrichton

fixes #29584

r? @alexcrichton

+pub struct Foo;
+
+#[doc(hidden)]
+mod bar {
+    trait Bar {}
+
+    impl Bar for ::Foo {}
+}
